alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 13 at 7:26PM MST until August 13 at 10:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Western Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 1030 PM MST. * At 726 PM MST, Mohave County gauge reports and cameras indicated flash flooding ongoing over White HIlls Road at Detrital Wash and will begin shortly over Temple Bar Road. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Temple Bar Road about 8 miles west of Temple Bar Marina and White Hills Road just east of Highway 93. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
